com.aurel.track.item.budgetCost

Class AccountingBL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.item.budgetCost.AccountingBL

  • public abstract class AccountingBL
extends java.lang.Object
    Business logic for accounting Deals with costs/efforts for new issues (managed in session) and existing issues (managed in database)
